business.headline: Why are some investors choosing fixed deposits over SIPs?Many stock market experts suggest that mid-cap and small-cap stocks are currently expensive, which has triggered a correction in the last six months.

Explained: Why IndusInd Bank share price is rising today after 27% crashIndusIndi Bank stock price: The stock surged nearly 14% from its intraday low, climbing to Rs 690 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), breaking a five-day losing streak.At around 12 pm, shares of the company were up 3.18% to Rs 676.80 on the NSE.

5 billionaires at Trump's swearing-in see over $200 billion vanish in weeks   The start of Donald Trump's second term has been brutal for some of the world's richest billionaires, including those present at his swearing-in ceremony.

Jio and Airtel sign deals with Elon Musk's Starlink for satellite internet in IndiaJio and Airtel have signed separate agreements with Elon Musk's Starlink to bring satellite internet to India. The partnerships aim to provide high-speed broadband to remote and underserved areas. Starlink's service rollout depends on government approval. The deals could improve connectivity for education, healthcare, and businesses in regions lacking fibre-optic infrastructure. Starlink uses a constellation of 6,900 satellites for global broadband coverage.

Reliance shares gain after Jio's deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX for StarlinkRIL shares were up over 1% in early trade but gave up some gains due to market volatility. Around 10 am, the stock was trading 0.35% higher at Rs 1,251.50.
Infosys, TCS, Wipro: Why are major IT stocks falling today?At around 9:50 am, Infosys shares were down 3.5% and Wipro fell over 3.35%. HCLTech was down over 2.4% and TCS tumbled nearly 2%.

Sensex, Nifty swing between gains and losses in volatile session; IT stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex, which was up nearly 300 points in early trade, fell 91.43 points to trade at 74,010.37 around 9:30 am. The Nifty50 also fell 40.60 points to trade at 22,457.30.

After Airtel, Jio signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink to IndiaThe partnership aims to expand broadband access across India, especially in remote areas. Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Stock market today: Will Trump's latest tariff threat impact Dalal Street today? Stock market opening today: While domestic stocks remain under pressure, experts suggested that Dalal Street is unlikely to feel the impact of the ongoing weakness in US stock markets.

US stock markets remain under pressure after Monday's big crash. 3 things to knowThe S&P 500 dropped as low as 5,528.41, marking a 10% fall from its February 19 record of 6,144.15—hitting what traders call a "market correction."

Wall Street sinks amid Trump's tariff hike on Canadian metalsThe US stock market tumbled further after Trump doubled tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum, with the Dow plunging 554 points amid rising economic uncertainty and fears of a prolonged trade war.

US stock market: Wall Street indices remain under pressure amid slowdown fearsAt the opening bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 73.8 points, or 0.18%, to 41,837.95. The S&P 500 lost 10.9 points, or 0.19%, to 5,603.65, while the Nasdaq Composite was the only major index that recovered slightly in early trade.

entertainment.headline: Did Ekta Kapoor just take a jibe at Ram Kapoor in a video about Ozempic?Filmmaker Ekta Kapoor on Tuesday shared a video on Instagram in which she was seen talking about her weight gain and if she should follow artificial methods to lose some weight. There was also a Ram Kapoor connection.

Ibrahim Ali Khan re-posts Nadaaniyan's poor ratings, puzzled fans reactIbrahim Ali Khan reposted his film, Nadaaniyan's low ratings. Fans were puzzled by the actor's move in highlighting the film's poor performance.

Singer Ne-Yo introduces his four girlfriends from his polyamorous relationship In a candid revelation, American singer and songwriter Ne-Yo introduced his four girlfriends, embracing a polyamorous lifestyle. The musician shared insights into his unique relationship dynamic online, calling it his 'pyramid'.

Tapu-Sonu wedding in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah…? Fans say 'must be Bhide's dream'A promo of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah shows Tapu marrying Sonu, leaving fans in shock. Many speculate it's a dream sequence, as Bhide disapproves of Tapu. The sitcom, India's longest-running, first aired in 2008.

Exclusive: Louis Tomlinson on India debut, love for Indian food, and solo career Louis Tomlinson, former One Direction member, embarked on his first solo performance in India at Lollapalooza 2025. He expressed excitement and a fondness for Indian culture, particularly its cuisine, during an exclusive interview.

Telugu actor-politician Posani Krishna Murali granted bail in all casesActor and YSRCP member Posani Krishna Murali has been granted bail in all cases. The YSRCP accused Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu-led government of filing 17 cases against him as part of a political vendetta.

SRK, Aishwarya Rai top contenders to replace Amitabh Bachchan on KBC: StudyAccording to a recent study conducted among fans, actors Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai are the top picks to replace megastar Amitabh Bachchan on his game show Kaun Banega Crorepati.

TV star Disha Vakani was told not to scream during labour: Gayatri Mantra helpedDisha Vakani, famed for her role as Dayaben in TMKOC, opened up about her use of the Gayatri Mantra during the birth of her daughter, Stuti.

Louis Tomlinson on first India visit, solo career, Lollapalooza, love for Indian food | Exclusive Former One Direction member Louis Tomlinson finally arrives in India! In this exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, he talks about his long-awaited visit, his excitement for Lollapalooza, and his deep love for Indian food (yes, he tried butter chicken!).

Daredevil Born Again breaks streaming records with 7.5 million views Latest Marvel series, Daredevil Born Again, has set a new streaming record with 7.5 million views in just five days. The series marks the return of Charlie Cox as Daredevil, alongside a mix of returning and new cast members.
American rock band Guns N' Roses to return to India after 12 years American rock band Guns N' Roses will return to India after 12 years. They will perform in Mumbai on May 17.

Kim Soo-hyun denies 'baseless' relationship claims with late actor Kim Sae-ronActor Kim Soo-hyun and his agency Gold Medalist have rejected allegations made by the YouTube channel Garosero Research Institute. The accusations suggest a past relationship with the late Kim Sae-ron and blame the agency for her financial woes.

general news.headline: Over 150 passengers rescued from hijacked Pakistan train, 27 insurgents killed Live UpdatesThe Baloch Liberation Army, a separatist insurgent group, has claimed responsibility for hijacking the Jaffar Express. The group claims to hold about 200 hostages, but authorities have yet to confirm this figure.

Andhra's own 'Sheeshmahal': Jagan Mohan Reddy's Rushikonda Palace under lensJagan Mohan Reddy's grand mansion on Rushikonda Hill in Visakhapatnam is at the centre of a political storm. Chandrababu Naidu-led Andhra Pradesh government is in a dilemma to utilise the Rs 500 crore private palace built by the former Chief Minister.

150% tariff on US alcohol: White House criticises India again amid trade disputeThe White House Press Secretary's remarks came less than a month before US President Donald Trump's looming April 2 deadline to impose reciprocal tariffs on India. As per reports, the US has asked India to remove tariffs on nearly all goods except agricultural products.

How Jinnah's betrayal sparked Baloch freedom movementBalochistan has seen periods of active rebellion for independence from Pakistan. It was the betrayal and merger of Kalat, a princely state in what is now Balochistan, into Pakistan by Muhammad Ali Jinnah that is one of the causes of the fierce battle for independence by the Baloch people.

Bitten by a dog? Rabies vaccine is not enough, you need more to stay safeIn the event of a dog bite, a person needs more than just the rabies vaccine. Experts highlight the importance of immunoglobulin despite taking a the ARV shot.

Gold on body, Ranya Rao declared no goods at airport. Then metal detector went offIndia Today accessed the DRI's arrest memo against Ranya Rao who was arrested for smuggling gold from Dubai. The memo reveals details of arrest, confiscation of smuggled goods and Ranya's voluntary statements.

Ukraine ready for ceasefire with Russia, hope Putin will agree too: TrumpTrump's reaction came after Kyiv said it was ready to accept a 30-day ceasefire with Moscow, following talks with US representatives in Saudi Arabia's Jeddah on Tuesday.
Video: Chaos in Noida market as SUV rams multiple vehicles, then fleesThe police have launched a manhunt for the driver who fled the spot after the incident in Noida's Sector 16 car market.

Trump keeps his promise, buys Tesla, models for fleet outside White HouseAt the press conference on Tuesday, five vehicles were on display at the White Hoouse's South Law, with Donald Trump selecting a red Model S sedan to show his support to Elon Musk as he faces backlash over his efforts to downsize the federal government.

Telugu veteran named in complaint 22 years after actor Soundarya's plane crashA fresh complaint has been filed against actor Mohan Babu, 22 years after the plane crash that took the life of popular South Indian actor Soundarya. She played Radha in Amitabh Bachchan's Sooryavansham.

Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Sensex falls over 400 points. 3 factors behind today's stock market slumpStock market today: At around 12:42 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 439.77 points to 73,662.55 and the Nifty50 was trading 150.50 points lower at 22,347.40.

Screaming, firing, blast: Survivor recounts Pakistan train hijackPassengers who were aboard the Jaffar Express that was hijacked in Pakistan, recounted the horror that unfolded inside the train, including intense screaming, firing and a blast as insurgents took control of the carriage.

Maruti Suzuki 800 Tatkal: Have you heard about this variantThe Maruti Suzuki 800 had a Tatkal variant, a unique offering by Maruti Suzuki during 1989-1990s to address the high demand for the iconic Maruti 800.

Won't negotiate, do whatever the hell you want: Iran President to TrumpIran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said on Saturday that Tehran would not be bullied into negotiations, a day after Trump said he had sent a letter urging Iran to engage in talks on a new nuclear deal.

Must learn to read, write Tamil for state government jobs: Madras High CourtThe Madurai Bench of the Madras High Court ruled that Tamil Nadu government job aspirants must read and write Tamil. The ruling came while the court dismissed a Tamil Nadu Electricity Board  employee's petition against being terminated for failing to clear the mandatory Tamil language exam.

Bihar: Mayor's 2-hour Holi break call stirs row, BJP slams 'terrorist mindset'Darbhanga mayor Anjum Ara proposed that Holi festivities be halted temporarily between 12.30 pm to 2 pm as the timing of Jumma (Friday prayers) cannot be changed.

Will the surge in divorces and single living reshape Indian society?The meaning of relationships, marriage, and children is now up for debate. But do you think these changes could have an impact, whether positive or negative, on society?

US Vice President JD Vance, Second Lady Usha to visit India this month: ReportThe visit to India will mark JD Vance's second international trip as the US Vice President, and his wife's first to her ancestral country as the Second Lady.
TikTok star, known for 'mukbang' videos, dies at 24 due to obesity-related issuesAfter spending three months in the hospital battling obesity-related health issues, Efecan Kultur died on March 7.

Kim Sae-ron's unpublished statement emerges after dating rumours with Kim Soo-hyunAlmost a month after South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's death, her aunt has alleged K-drama star Kim Soo-hyun was in a relationship with Sae-ron, and that they began dating when she was only a minor.

Sidharth Malhotra on embracing parenthood: Definitely get your boys in checkActor Sidharth Malhotra opened up about fatherhood, discussing the significance of values and emotional vulnerability. He shared insights on masculinity and the importance of accountability in relationships.

Karan Johar adds hilarious spin to 'insider vs outsider' debate: What a privilege Karan Johar gave a hilarious twist to the insider and outside debate with a picture on social media. The filmmaker said that he is very 'happy to be entitled' to his own thoughts.

Sidharth Malhotra was there when Kiara filmed Lust Stories: We met right after thatSidharth Malhotra revealed he met Kiara Advani on the Lust Stories set and praised her bold film choices. He shared how marriage changed him.

sports.headline: PSG showed great personality, character in Liverpool shootout win: Luis EnriqueLuis Enrique was proud of his PSG side after their thrilling shootout win against Liverpool on Tuesday, March 11. PSG entered the quarterfinals of the Champions League with the win.

Real Madrid vs Atletico Madrid: All you need to know about big UCL clashReal Madrid look to seal their Champions League quarter-final spot as they face Atletico Madrid in a tense second-leg clash at the Metropolitano, with Jude Bellingham returning to bolster Carlo Ancelotti's attacking options.

Rohit Sharma must have goal in mind to play in 2027 ODI World Cup: Ricky PontingRicky Ponting feels that Rohit Sharma has the goal of playing the ODI World Cup 2027 in his mind as the Indian captain decided to prolong his career after the Champions Trophy 2027 final win.

Pakistan batting coach makes U-turn after pulling out of New Zealand tourPakistan batting coach Mohammad Yousuf, who had earlier pulled out of the New Zealand tour citing his daughter's health, has made a U-turn. Yousuf has informed that he would be travelling with the team.

India heroes gain big on social media during Champions TrophyThe Indian cricket team stars gained a huge number of followers on social media platforms during the Champions Trophy matches. Virat Kohli and Hardik Pandya were the leaders when it came to gaining followers.

Anand Mahindra backs India skater Tara Prasad for 2026 OlympicsAnand Mahindra praised skater Tara Prasad's success and decision to represent India, highlighting her resilience and determination after overcoming injuries to secure national titles and eye a spot at the 2026 Winter Olympics.

Rahul's ability to adapt to conditions and deliver under pressure should earn him more plaudits than what they have in recent times.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
